name: Pluto's Revenge
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson says that Pluto is not a planet anymore. Well, Pluto does not agree and now the infuriated "planet" is out for revenge.

Control Pluto as the miniature rock goes on a rampage throughout the solar system on a revenge quest for the ages.

Created over 48-hours for the No More Sweden 2015 Game Jam.

Team members:

Jonathan Hansson - design, art, programming

Tor Hellström - design, art

Audio created by a nice Norwegian guy who's name I did not remember to write down.
